sentences.english: Police parked vans in front of the cathedral to block access to the nearby LSE.
sentences.chinese: 警察通过设置路障封锁了通往伦敦证交所的通道。

sentences.english: A: We have now 10 subsidiary companies listed on the stock exchanges.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在有十家在证交所上市的子公司。

sentences.english: This made a big difference in the PHLX Gold and Silver Sector Index, traded on the Philadelphia Stock Exchange.
sentences.chinese: 费城证交所的黄金白银指数走势却截然相反。
